text: Carla Bruni,Carla Bruni a obtenu sa naturalisation – Le Figaro, 9 July 2008 now known by her name of use Carla Bruni-Sarkozy (born Carla Gilberta Bruni Tedeschi; 23 December 1967 in Turin, Italy) is an Italian-French singer, songwriter and former model. From 2008 to 2012, Bruni was the First Lady of France. She married then President of the French Republic Nicolas Sarkozy in February 2008. They have one child. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * *Carla Bruni: from catwalk to Elysee – Expatica, 11 February 2008 Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of France Category:French models Category:French singers Category:Italian singer- songwriters Category:21st-century Italian singers Category:21st-century Italian songwriters Category:People from Turin
title: Carla Bruni
